html:
• Home
  • Careers

We are looking for a driven, digitally savvy E-Commerce and Digital Marketing Coordinator to support our online presence, content strategy, and customer experience. This is a part-time role with the potential to evolve into a full-time position based on performance and business needs.

Location: CHICAGO, IL (In-person)
Schedule: Part-time, 3 days per week
Compensation: Based on experience

POSITION OVERVIEW
ALMASIKA is a Chicago based Fine Jewelry brand rooted in art, history, and culture.

We are looking for a driven, digitally savvy E-Commerce and Digital Marketing Coordinator to support our online presence, content strategy, and customer experience. This is a unique opportunity to take ownership of digital touchpoints across Shopify, Klaviyo, paid campaigns, influencer collaborations, and backend website management while contributing to the voice and growth of a luxury jewelry brand.

This is a part-time role with the potential to evolve into a full-time position based on performance and business needs.

Key Responsibilities

E-Commerce & Customer Experience

● Manage product uploads, descriptions, and image updates on Shopify
● Oversee fulfillment of online orders and ensure packaging meets luxury standards
● Support virtual appointments by preparing product trays and managing booking logistics
● Respond to customer service inquiries across platforms (email, website, DMs) with attentiveness and brand-appropriate tone

Digital Marketing Campaigns

● Plan, draft, and schedule email campaigns via Klaviyo
● Write and edit copy for product launches, newsletters, and promotions
● Assist in managing paid digital campaigns (Meta, Google Ads), and monitor results
● Conduct keyword research and optimize product/editorial content for SEO
● Maintain campaign calendars and oversee digital asset timelines

Content & Social Media Support

● Coordinate social media content creation and scheduling (Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok)
● Maintain digital content libraries and archives
● Support creation of visuals using Canva or Adobe tools
● Contribute to campaign storytelling and visual direction

Influencer & Community Engagement

● Identify and coordinate outreach to brand-aligned influencers and stylists
● Manage engagement tracking, user-generated content, and gifting logistics
● Monitor brand mentions and compile insight reports

Analytics & Reporting

● Track performance across e-commerce, email, and social platforms
● Compile weekly or monthly reports and make data-informed recommendations

QUALIFICATIONS
● 1–2 years experience in digital marketing, e-commerce, or a related role
● Strong written communication and organizational skills
● Familiarity with Shopify, Klaviyo, Canva, and Google Analytics
● A passion for digital storytelling, branding, and the luxury market
● Detail-oriented, proactive, and collaborative
● Must be available to work in-person at our Hinsdale office

TO APPLY
Please send your resume and a brief note about your interest and availability to contact@almasika.com with the subject line: E-Commerce and Digital Marketing Coordinator.

@almasikafinejewellery

MELISSA KAYE JEWELRY IS HIRING A DIGITAL MARKETING MANAGER In New York, NY

Launched in 2013, Melissa Kaye jewelry is created through the lens of a native New Yorker, bringing together the designer’s metropolitan-inspired aesthetic with an air of refined ease. The Digital Marketing Manager will be responsible for all aspects of strategic communications on the brand’s online channels, including website and social media.
